mapper.select: SELECT pm.user_id AS userId, u.username AS username, COALESCE(u.name, u.username) AS name, u.invite_code AS inviteCode, pm.role AS role, DATE_FORMAT(pm.join_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS joinTime FROM project_member pm LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON pm.user_id = u.id WHERE pm.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY pm.join_time ASC
